City Council
============

Regular Meetings
----------------

* 6:30 p.m.
* 2nd and 4th Thursday of every month
* City Hall  
  102 E Main Street  
  Pilot Point, TX 76258

Elections
---------

Our City Council Election is held every year in the month of May.

[See our 2025 City Council calendar here](https://www.pilotpointtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=5904)

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

City Charter and Governance Policy
----------------------------------

On November 13, 2009, the City Council adopted Ordinance 069-07-2009 formally adopting the City Charter, [which can be read in its entirety here](https://ecode360.com/40504595#40504595).

On October 24, 2024, the City Council adopted a Governance Policy and Procedures outlining duties and responsibilities of Council, as well as meeting and agenda management. [The policy can be read in its entirety here](https://www.pilotpointtx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/5777).

-------

To contact Mayor or Councilmembers, see below for their email addresses and city cell phone numbers.

Ray Dane, Place 3 - [rdane@pilotpointtx.gov](mailto:rdane@pilotpointtx.gov) | 940-305-8651

Brian Murrell, Place 4 - [bmurrell@pilotpointtx.gov](mailto:%20bmurrell@pilotpointtx.gov) | 940-290-4763
